constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 21/00314/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:131_41_10 Rev B Proposed Ground Floor Plan131_41_11 Rev B Proposed First And Loft Plans133_41_30 Rev B Proposed Elevations and Sections131_41_12 Rev B Proposed Roof Plan and SectionReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00314/HOU (Erection of single storey rear and side extension. Hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion) dated 13/04/2021.  Amendments to consist of rendering the rear blockwork rather than clad with timber,  side wall adjacent No 40 has been set 120mm away from the neighbour's wall in order to respect the neighbour's request that the new wall was not constructed immediately adjacent to their wall and a boiler flue and SVPs have been added to the side elevation facing No 40 for completeness
